title: HSBC app stopped recognising finger print
content:
HSBC app stopped recognising the finger print sensor on my pixel 3a permanently. I've tried deleting the app and reinstalling it and it is still not recognised. 

I had this occasionally happen in the past , but closing and re-opening the app would fix it.

Following the recent pixel update (January 2021), it has just stopped working altogether. I haven't been able to find any restrictions in the settings related to the fingerprint senor. Any suggestions?
